general.seo-title: Fast & Reliable Web Hosting • Guarapo Media
general.seo-description: Get lightning-fast web hosting with 99.9% uptime guarantee. Start your online presence with our premium hosting solutions from €90/year.

cover.subtitle: No idea what hosting means? Don’t worry. We’ll help.
cover.title:
Get Your Business Online
With a Name You Love

packages.title: Human service, no tech talk, real help
packages.description: Personal support (small biz helping small biz)
packages.tagline: Need help choosing? Contact us now!

testimonials.title: Trusted by incredible Customers
testimonials.description: See what our customers say about our hosting services

list.name: Angel Benitez
list.message: Guarapo Media hosting has been rock solid for our restaurant website. Fast loading times and zero downtime means more customers can find us online!

list.name: Ernesto Rangel
list.message: The hosting service is excellent. Our event website handles traffic spikes perfectly, and the support team is always there when we need them.

list.name: Violeta Gladstone
list.message: My flower shop website runs beautifully on their hosting. The setup was so easy, and my customers love how fast the site loads!

list.name: Jamie Brasco
list.message: Outstanding hosting service! The uptime is incredible and the support team goes above and beyond. Highly recommended!

list.name: Carlos Fafian
list.message: We had no idea how to make a website, but Guarapo took care of everything. Now parents can find us online easily. They made it so simple for us.

list.name: Gerardo G.
list.message: Our site needs to handle events, news, and videos. Guarapo Hosting keeps it fast and always online. Plus, when we needed help, they actually answered!

list.name: Claudia S.
list.message: We needed a site for students, signups, and class info. Guarapo gave us personalized support and made the tech part invisible — just how we like it.

guarantee.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.description: Try our hosting risk-free for 30 days. If you're not completely satisfied, we'll refund your money - no questions asked.
